name: Parry In Hell
description:
Parry in Hell

A game made for VimJam3 gamejam with the "Multi-use" limitation and "Turn up the Heat" theme.

Multi-use: The parry mechanic:

1. Protects from damage.

2. Builds up a resource.

3. Uses up the resource to deal damage.

Turn up the Heat:

1. The game is set in hell.

2. The sword heats up as you parry.

Parry attacks and projectiles to build up the heat meter and once it's full, unleash all of it by parrying another projectile, returning it to sender.

Block by holding [ Spacebar ].

If you start blocking just before getting hit, you parry instead.

To defeat The Demon, parry until it dies.
